details:
A new MariaDB minor maintenance release 10.3.38 has been released. It
includes fix for a major performance/memory consumption issue (MDEV-29988).


For further details, see the MariaDB 10.3 release notes:


https://mariadb.com/kb/en/mariadb-10-3-37-release-notes/
 <https://mariadb.com/kb/en/mariadb-10-3-38-release-notes/>


For Debian 10 buster, this problem has been fixed in version
1:10.3.38-0+deb10u1.


We recommend that you upgrade your mariadb-10.3 packages.


For the detailed security status of mariadb-10.3 please refer to
its security tracker page at:
<https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/mariadb-10.3>


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
